timeline.content:
Hey Udai, 

Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London! I am Prachi and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. 

Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

Hi Udai,

We would love an update from you regarding the status of your accommodation. We currently have limited availability and want to help you find accommodation that is well within your 
requirements.

Just in case, if you have already found accommodation, you can help us with the details and we can try rolling out cashbacks for you, subject to availability in London.

Also, if you have friends looking for student accommodation, you can refer them at http://amberstudent.com/refer. If your referred friend books accommodation, you will get a 50 GBP Amazon gift card.

timeline.content:
Hello Udai,
Good afternoon! I hope you're doing well.

My name is Prachi, and I’m reaching out from AmberStudent. We’re partnered with UCL to assist students with accommodation.

We received your booking form for a Classic Ensuite at Yugo Depot Point, London (39 weeks), and just wanted to confirm whether you'd like to go ahead with this option or if you're considering other accommodations.

I've tried reaching out to you via email, WhatsApp, and phone, but haven’t been able to connect.

Kindly let us know a convenient time for a quick call so we can assist you further.

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: 074-848-50258 is busy. Just leave your message after the tone. When you're done, press hash or just hang up.
Speaker B: Hello there. I am Prachi from Amber and I connected with you with the ucl, the University of London. We have partnered with them. They provided us the information that you're looking for accommodation and even we connected. I try to connect with you on the call and that's why I shared a mail and a WhatsApp video. So it would be great if you can just connect with me so that we can complete your processing and you can book your accommodation. Thank you.
